name: fold-studio-invite
buildCommand: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); let config=fs.readFileSync('config.js','utf8'); config=config.replace('YOUR_API_KEY_HERE', process.env.AIRTABLE_API_KEY || 'YOUR_API_KEY_HERE'); config=config.replace('YOUR_BASE_ID_HERE', process.env.AIRTABLE_BASE_ID || 'YOUR_BASE_ID_HERE'); fs.writeFileSync('config.js', config);"
